scripts.build:css: cross-env NODE_ENV=production sass scss/main.scss:css/main.css --load-path=scss/abstracts --style=compressed && postcss css/**/*.css --replace --verbose
scripts.build:js: node build-js.js && terser dist/main.js -o dist/main.min.js --compress --mangle --comments false
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --watch js/0_global --watch js/1_utils --watch js/2_components --watch js/3_pages --ext js --exec "node build-js.js"
